features: 3-hand: 3-hand movement and crown placement at 3 o'clock.
Classic with a twist: Clean and considered with a 40mm case.
Modern: Printed hour indices with a stamped seconds track.
Durable comfort: Custom solid stainless steel free-swing 5-link band with solid stainless steel double pusher clasp.
Watch movement: Miyota Japanese quartz 3 hand movement and crown placement at 3 o’clock.
Watch dial: The dial features bold printed hour indices and a stamped seconds track.
Watch case: 40mm, 50 meter/5 ATM custom stainless steel case, hardened mineral crystal, double gasket crown, stainless steel screw down caseback, and spring pin lugs.
Watch band: 20-18mm tapered custom solid stainless steel free-swing 5 link bracelet with a solid stainless steel double pusher clasp.
